capabilities.name: create_entities
capabilities.description: Create multiple new entities (without observations) in the knowledge graph. Add observations separately using 'add_observations'.

capabilities.name: create_relations
capabilities.description: Create multiple new relations between entities in the knowledge graph. Relations should be in active voice

capabilities.name: add_observations
capabilities.description: Add new observations associated with existing entities. Parses content for timestamp/status.

capabilities.name: delete_entities
capabilities.description: Delete multiple entities and their associated relations and observations from the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: delete_observations
capabilities.description: Delete specific observations by matching entity name and content string

capabilities.name: delete_relations
capabilities.description: Delete multiple relations from the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: read_graph
capabilities.description: Read the entire knowledge graph (entities, relations, observations)

capabilities.name: search_nodes
capabilities.description: Search for entities based on query (matching name, type, aliases, or observation content). Returns matching entities, their relations, and their observations.

capabilities.name: open_nodes
capabilities.description: Open specific nodes by name. Returns the entities, their relations, and their observations.

capabilities.name: update_entities
capabilities.description: Update fields (like type, aliases, or name) of existing entities. If 'newName' is provided, also updates all references in relations and observations.

capabilities.name: update_relations
capabilities.description: Update multiple existing relations in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: get_context_info
capabilities.description: Retrieves detailed context for specified entities (matching names/aliases). Returns entities, their relations, and a filtered/sorted list of their observations (Active first, then recent history, then untimestamped).
